title: Discover Destination UA
overview: Destination UA is the project showing Ukraine from foreigner's perspective.In First season we spent 30 days traveling along the tourist route called Golden Triangle â€“ Kyiv-Lviv-Odesa.We've visited more than 100 locations, tried over two dozen unique Ukrainian dishes, filmed ancient history places and modern spots. We had a lot of fun.In the second season of the show we are visited next regions: Kyiv, Chernihiv, Sumy, Kharkiv, Poltava, Dnipro, Kherson, Mykolaiv, Vinnytsia, Zhytomyr.Next 100 locations, interesting facts, adventures are waiting for you.
